name: SquareSpace
description:
SquareSpace is an 2d arcade survival game that  you can play against your friends. Your goal is to survive for as long as possible in the eternal storm of  metorites and be the last square alive. You can focus on sabotaging to your opponents or just not getting hit yourself. Challenge your Mom, Dad, Cat and Dog to find out who the real SquareSpace champion is .

SquareSpace is also my first Unity Game so expect it to be really bad but please consider giving your opinion and feedback so I can do better in future games ( :

How to play:

Restart:  Space

Join third player: 3

Movment P1: WASD

Movment P2: Arrows

Movment P3: UHJK
